m_szDocTitle: Riversimple Looks to Raise £1M Through Sharein For Lightweight Hydrogen-Powered Vehicle "Rasa" - Crowdfund Insider
m_szDocSumamry: By Samantha Hurst Riversimple , a UK-based hydrogen fuel-cell car brand, has launched a Sharein campaign to raise £1M for the development of its lightweight hydrogen-powered vehicle, Rasa. The Rasa is described as a two-seater “network electric” car that is powered by a hydrogen fuel cell. Riversimple confirmed that the vehicle’s prototype has clocked over 60mph and has been reportedly “weaving neatly” through traffic in London and on the country roads of Powys.
